name: Logis - free IOS Puzzle game
description:
Logis starts off real easy, but gets challenging soon. The concept is simple: guide the dots to their destination in the maze by clicking the switches. Do this before time runs out or you'll have to start all over again.

For now, Logis is only available on IOS, but it will be released to other platforms soon. Logis is free and does not contain any ads. A Level Pack is available as IAP for 0.99, but the free version contains enough levels to keep you occupied for a good while ;-)

I am putting this game here on Itch.io to get some feedback from you. Is the game too hard, too easy, boring, does it just suck? Let me know! Have a suggestion for a level? Drop it in the comments below! Like it? Please share it!
